data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Norrkoping.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Malmo pushes forward through Erdal Rakip, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Malmo.
Malmo's Isaac Thelin attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Norrkoping goal kick.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Free kick for Norrkoping in the half of Malmo.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 9, Norrkoping's Isak Bergmann Johanneson breaks free at Östgötaporten. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Malmo at Östgötaporten.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Malmo throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
In the minute 11, Norrkoping are whistled for offside.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norrkoping's half?
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Malmo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Malmo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, The match at Östgötaporten has been interrupted briefly for a check on Arnor Traustason, who is down injured.
Arnor Traustason returns to the field for Malmo after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Malmo at Östgötaporten.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Simon Thern for Norrkoping gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Norrkoping.
In the minute 22, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Andreas Ekberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Ola Toivonen (Malmo) has received a yellow card from Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 26, Jonathan Levi of Norrkoping smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 27, At Östgötaporten, Norrkoping are penalized for being offside.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Norrkoping to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
In the minute 30, Norrkoping push upfield but Andreas Ekberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Norrkoping territory.
In the minute 35, Malmo are pushing forward but Erdal Rakip's finish is wide of the goal.
Andreas Ekberg awards Norrkoping a goal kick.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in for Norrkoping at Östgötaporten.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Norrkoping.
In the minute 38, Free kick in a good position for Malmo!
Ola Toivonen (Malmo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Andreas Ekberg awards Norrkoping a goal kick.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Norrkoping's half?
In the minute 42, Play has been interrupted briefly in Norrkoping to check on Eric Larsson, who is grimacing with pain.
Malmo’s Eric Larsson is on his feet again at Östgötaporten.
At Östgötaporten the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Malmo.
In Norrkoping, Jonas Knudsen of Malmo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Andreas Ekberg has blown to start the second-half.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 47, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Norrkoping's Jonathan Levi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Isaac Thelin (Malmo) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
Goal! Franz Brorsson gives Malmo a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 51, Great play from Erdal Rakip to set up the goal.
Free kick Norrkoping.
In Norrkoping a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Malmo throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
Goal kick for Norrkoping at Östgötaporten.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Malmo drives forward and Arnor Traustason gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Malmo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Norrkoping.
Malmo's Isaac Thelin misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Norrkoping have a goal kick.
Andreas Ekberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Norrkoping in the half of Malmo.
Andreas Ekberg awards Malmo a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Erdal Rakip for Malmo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
Erdal Rakip has recovered and rejoins the match in Norrkoping.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 68, Jon Dahl Tomasson (Malmo) is making a first change, with Bonke Innocent replacing the possibly injured Erdal Rakip.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Levi with Sead Haksabanovic. This is the first substitution made today by Jens Gustafsson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping just outside Malmo's area.
Can Norrkoping get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
Norrkoping are coming forward and Sead Haksabanovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Eric Smith is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Norrkoping's Eric Smith is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Norrkoping in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 77, Pontus Almqvist is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Linus Hallenius (Norrkoping) has replaced the possibly injured Pontus Almqvist.
Jens Gustafsson is making the team's third substitution at Östgötaporten with Henrik Castegren replacing Lars Gerson.
In the minute 80, Norrkoping to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Norrkoping throw-in in Malmo's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Lasse Nielsen is replacing Ola Toivonen for Malmo at Östgötaporten.
Free kick for Norrkoping in their own half.
Bonke Innocent is booked for the away team.
In the minute 84, Can Norrkoping get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
Norrkoping's Sead Haksabanovic gets in a shot on goal at Östgötaporten. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Norrkoping have been awarded a corner by Andreas Ekberg.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Malmo’s Marko Johansson and play has been suspended briefly.
Lasse Nielsen (Malmo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 86, Rasmus Lauritsen for Norrkoping has been booked by Andreas Ekberg and receives a first yellow card.
Marko Johansson is back on the pitch.
Andreas Ekberg signals a Malmo throw-in in Norrkoping's half.
In the minute 88, Norrkoping will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Malmo.
Goal kick for Norrkoping at Östgötaporten.
Corner awarded to Norrkoping.
Andreas Ekberg will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Norrkoping awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Norrkoping a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andreas Ekberg signals a free kick to Norrkoping in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Alexander Fransson levels the score at 1-1.
Rasmus Lauritsen with an assist there.
At Östgötaporten, Isaac Thelin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
